required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Investigation of the Effect of Food on the Bioavailability of Empagliflozin / Linagliptin Fixed Dose Combination Tablet in an Open, Randomised, Single Dose, Two Way Cross-over Study in Healthy Japanese Male Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The trial will be performed as an open-label, randomised, single-dose, two-sequence crossover design for the assessment of effect of food on bioavailability of empagliflozin / linagliptin fixed dose combination (FDC) tablet.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 2 hours (h) before the administration in first subject and 0:20 h, 0:40h, 1:00h, 1:30h, 2:00h, 2:30h, 3:00h, 4:00h, 6:00h, 8:00h, 10:00h, 12:00h, 24:00h, 34:00h, 48:00h, 72:00h after drug administration.
primary_outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration of the analyte in plasma (Cmax) for linagliptin

primary_outcome.time_frame: 2 hours (h) before the administration in first subject and 0:20 h, 0:40h, 1:00h, 1:30h, 2:00h, 2:30h, 3:00h, 4:00h, 6:00h, 8:00h, 10:00h, 12:00h, 24:00h, 34:00h, 48:00h, 72:00h after drug administration.
primary_outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration of the analyte in plasma (Cmax) for empagliflozin

primary_outcome.time_frame: 2 hours (h) before the administration in first subject and 0:20 h, 0:40h, 1:00h, 1:30h, 2:00h, 2:30h, 3:00h, 4:00h, 6:00h, 8:00h, 10:00h, 12:00h, 24:00h, 34:00h, 48:00h, 72:00h after drug administration.
primary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the last quantifiable drug plasma concentration (AUC 0-tz) for linagliptin

primary_outcome.time_frame: 2 hours (h) before the administration in first subject and 0:20 h, 0:40h, 1:00h, 1:30h, 2:00h, 2:30h, 3:00h, 4:00h, 6:00h, 8:00h, 10:00h, 12:00h, 24:00h, 34:00h, 48:00h, 72:00h after drug administration.
primary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the last quantifiable drug plasma concentration (AUC 0-tz) for empagliflozin

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2 hours (h) before the administration in first subject and 0:20 h, 0:40h, 1:00h, 1:30h, 2:00h, 2:30h, 3:00h, 4:00h, 6:00h, 8:00h, 10:00h, 12:00h, 24:00h, 34:00h, 48:00h, 72:00h after drug administration.
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity (AUC0-infinity) for linagliptin

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2 hours (h) before the administration in first subject and 0:20 h, 0:40h, 1:00h, 1:30h, 2:00h, 2:30h, 3:00h, 4:00h, 6:00h, 8:00h, 10:00h, 12:00h, 24:00h, 34:00h, 48:00h, 72:00h after drug administration.
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity (AUC0-infinity) for empagliflozin.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2 hours (h) before the administration in first subject and 0:20 h, 0:40h, 1:00h, 1:30h, 2:00h, 2:30h, 3:00h, 4:00h, 6:00h, 8:00h, 10:00h, 12:00h, 24:00h, 34:00h, 48:00h, 72:00h after drug administration.
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 to 72 hours (AUC0-72) for linagliptin

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- Healthy male subjects age >=20 and <=45 years; body weight: >=50 kg and <=80 kg; body mass index: >=18.0 and <=25.0 kg/m2
- Without any clinically significant findings and complications on the basis of a complete medical history, including the physical examination, vital signs (blood pressure (BP), pulse rate (PR), body temperature)
- Signed and dated written informed consent prior to admission to the trial in accordance with the Good Clinical Practice (GCP) and the local legislation
Exclusion criteria:
- Any finding of the medical examination (including blood pressure, pulse rate and electrocardiogram) deviating from normal and of clinical relevance
- Further exclusion criteria apply

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: This is a Open-label, randomised, single-dose, two-sequence, crossover design

group.title: Empagliflozin 25 mg/ Linagliptin 5 mg (Sequence 1: Fed-Fasted)
group.description: Patient were orally administered Empagliflozin 25 mg/ linagliptin 5 mg fixed-dose combination (FDC) film coated tablet with 150 mL water after a standard Japanese breakfast in period 1 and after an overnight fast in period 2. Single-dose in each treatment period separated by wash-out period of at least 35 days

group.title: Empagliflozin 25 mg/ Linagliptin 5 mg (Sequence 2: Fasted-Fed)
group.description: Patient were orally administered Empagliflozin 25 mg/ linagliptin 5 mg fixed-dose combination (FDC) film-coated tablet with 150 mL water after an overnight fast in period 1 and after a standard Japanese breakfast in period 2. Single-dose in each treatment period separated by wash-out period of at least 35 days

baseline.population: Treated Set (TS): This analysis set included all 22 randomised subjects who were documented to have taken at least 1 dose of trial medication

group.title: Empagliflozin 25 mg/ Linagliptin 5 mg (Sequence 1: Fed-Fasted)
group.description: Patient were orally administered Empagliflozin 25 mg/ linagliptin 5 mg fixed-dose combination (FDC) film coated tablet with 150 mL water after a standard Japanese breakfast in period 1 and after an overnight fast in period 2. Single-dose in each treatment period separated by wash-out period of at least 35 days

group.title: Empagliflozin 25 mg/ Linagliptin 5 mg (Sequence 2: Fasted-Fed)
group.description: Patient were orally administered Empagliflozin 25 mg/ linagliptin 5 mg fixed-dose combination (FDC) film-coated tablet with 150 mL water after an overnight fast in period 1 and after a standard Japanese breakfast in period 2. Single-dose in each treatment period separated by wash-out period of at least 35 days

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

outcome.title: Cmax for Linagliptin
outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration of the analyte in plasma (Cmax) for linagliptin
outcome.time_frame: 2 hours (h) before the administration in first subject and 0:20 h, 0:40h, 1:00h, 1:30h, 2:00h, 2:30h, 3:00h, 4:00h, 6:00h, 8:00h, 10:00h, 12:00h, 24:00h, 34:00h, 48:00h, 72:00h after drug administration.
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic Set (PKS): The PKS included all 22 randomised subjects who were documented to have taken at least 1 dose of trial medication under fed or fasted condition without having protocol deviation relevant to the evaluation of relative bioavailability and without experiencing emesis at or before 2 times median tmax.

group.title: Empagliflozin 25 mg/ Linagliptin 5 mg (Reference;Fasted)
group.description: Patient were orally administered Empagliflozin 25 mg/ linagliptin 5 mg fixed-dose combination (FDC) film coated tablet with 150 mL water after an overnight fast in period 1 or period 2. Single-dose in each treatment period separated by wash-out period of at least 35 days

group.title: Empagliflozin 25 mg/ Linagliptin 5 mg (Test;Fed)
group.description: Patient were orally administered Empagliflozin 25 mg/ linagliptin 5 mg fixed-dose combination (FDC) film-coated tablet with 150 mL water after a standard Japanese breakfast in period 1 or period 2. Single-dose in each treatment period separated by wash-out period of at least 35 days

measure.title: Cmax for Linagliptin
measure.description: Maximum measured concentration of the analyte in plasma (Cmax) for linagliptin
measure.population: Pharmacokinetic Set (PKS): The PKS included all 22 randomised subjects who were documented to have taken at least 1 dose of trial medication under fed or fasted condition without having protocol deviation relevant to the evaluation of relative bioavailability and without experiencing emesis at or before 2 times median tmax.

analysis.groups_desc: Relative bioavailability of linagliptin after food intake compared to while in the fasting state was assessed using an ANOVA on the basis of the log transformed PK parameters. This model for the evaluation of effect of food on bioavailability included the effects: “sequence”, “subjects within sequences”, “period”, and “treatment” (i.e., feeding status). The effect “subjects within sequences” was considered as random, whereas the other effects were considered as fixed.
analysis.estimate_desc: Standard Error of the mean is actually geometric Standard Error of the mean.

outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration of the analyte in plasma (Cmax) for empagliflozin
outcome.time_frame: 2 hours (h) before the administration in first subject and 0:20 h, 0:40h, 1:00h, 1:30h, 2:00h, 2:30h, 3:00h, 4:00h, 6:00h, 8:00h, 10:00h, 12:00h, 24:00h, 34:00h, 48:00h, 72:00h after drug administration.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Boehringer Ingelheim (BI) acknowledges that investigators have the right to publish the study results. Investigators shall provide BI with a copy of any publication or presentation for review prior to any submission. Such review will be done with regard to proprietary information, information related to patentable inventions, medical, scientific, and statistical accuracy within 60 days. BI may request a delay of the publication in order to protect BI’s intellectual property rights
